mapper.select: SELECT IF(EXISTS( SELECT * FROM user WHERE id = #{id}), true, false)
mapper.insert: insert into user(id, `name`, agree, email, marketing_agree, marketing_agree_date, community_kakao_alarm, community_email_alarm, comment_kakao_alarm, comment_email_alarm, service_kakao_alarm, service_email_alarm) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{agree, typeHandler=JsonObjectTypeHandler}, #{email}, #{marketing_agree}, now(), #{community_kakao_alarm}, #{community_email_alarm}, #{comment_kakao_alarm}, #{comment_email_alarm}, #{service_kakao_alarm}, #{service_email_alarm})
